= 1.0 Introduction =

This User Guide provides instructions on how to install, configure, and run the Hackystat Eclipse sensor. 

= 2.0 Installation =

Before installing the Hackystat Eclipse Sensor, you should install Eclipse 3.2 first if you have not done so.
